lines.text: Mutual trust is a beautiful thing
You? Well this is a funny place to meet. Yah, I'm gonna die laughing.

[about King Ghidorah]
Can't you drive it away?
If you have an idea how to do it, won't you tell us?

[about the victory over King Ghidorah, while Godzilla is outside dancing]
A happy moment.
You should have left your sister packed in ice.

[both Glenn and Tetsuo pop up out of the water]
Well, what are we going to do now?
Well, we sure ain't gonna wait for the next ferry. Swim!
We need an exterminator, one that would drive away King Ghidorah. We need from you Monster Zero 1 and Monster Zero 2, Godzilla and Rodan.
Of course. Deadly serious. King Ghidorah was driven from Earth only with the combined strengths of Godzilla and Rodan. Would you help us?
Well, your request is quite unusual. We do not know how to answer that.
Plus, we did not know where Godzilla and Rodan are. If we did, how are we suppose to catch them and bring them here?

The startling announcement touched off demonstrations around the world. Some demonstrators urged capitulation, calling for peace at any price. The majority, however, seemed to favor strong resistance. Opposing factions clashed violently in dozens of world capitals, and police were hard pressed to restore order.
